name: Google ADK Agents
description: Best A2A agents built with Google's Agent Development Kit. The official framework for building production-ready agents.

agentNotes.a2a-sample-adk-expense-reimbursement: Enterprise expense automation with ADK workflows and approvals
agentNotes.a2a-sample-adk-facts: Simple fact-retrieval agent demonstrating ADK basics
agentNotes.a2a-sample-birthday-planner-adk: Event planning orchestration showing ADK coordination capabilities
agentNotes.a2a-sample-adk-cloud-run: Production deployment example for ADK agents on Google Cloud Run
agentNotes.multi-agent-adk: E-commerce microservices with inventory, consultation, and order agents
